summary.span: 提供用于操作绑定的静态方法，包括 、 和 对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类公开一组静态方法, 这些方法用作数据绑定的帮助器操作。This class exposes a set of static methods that serve as helper operations for data bindings.

summary.span: 如果存在，则从属性中删除绑定。

span.span: Removes the binding from a property if there is one.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果给定属性使用、 或进行数据绑定, 则此方法将删除相应的绑定表达式, 并将属性的值还原为在通过绑定设置任何本地值之前的值。If the given property is data-bound with a , , or , this method removes the corresponding binding expression and restores the value of the property to what it was before any local value was set through the binding. 如果给定属性不是数据绑定的, 则此方法不起作用。If the given property is not data-bound, this method has no effect.

summary.span: 当项容器从可视化树中移除时，获取替换 的对象。

span.span: Gets an object that replaces the when an item container is removed from the visual tree.

value.span: 当从可视化树中移除一个项容器时，一个对象替换了 。

span.span: An object that replaces the when an item container is removed from the visual tree.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果需要处理项容器的, 请使用此属性。Use this property if you need to deal with the of an item container. 项容器是用于显示中的项的 UI 元素。An item container is the UI element that displays an item in an . 在将数据绑定到集合时, 将为每个项生成项容器。When an is data bound to a collection, an item container is generated for each item. 在某些情况下，会从可视化树中删除项容器。In some cases, item containers are removed from the visual tree. 删除项容器的两种典型情况是: 从基础集合中删除项时, 以及何时在上启用虚拟化。Two typical cases where an item container is removed are when an item is removed from the underlying collection and when virtualization is enabled on the . 在这些情况下, 项容器的属性将设置为属性, 应检查是否等于, 然后才能访问中的项的事件存放.In these cases, the property of the item container will be set to the property You should check whether the is equal to the before accessing the in the event for item containers. 有关项容器和虚拟化的详细信息, 请参阅类中的备注。For more information about item containers and virtualization, see the remarks in the class.

summary.span: 使 对象能够参与对多个线程上使用的集合的同步访问。

span.span: Enables a object to participate in synchronized access to a collection that is used on multiple threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WPF 应用程序可以使用或它的一个子类 (、 、 、 等) 来显示数据的集合。A WPF application can display a collection of data using an or one of its subclasses (, , , , etc.). WPF 通过的子类对集合中的所有访问权限进行通道。 WPF channels all its access to the collection through a subclass of . 和都与在其上创建了的线程关联, 这意味着将禁止在不同的线程上使用它们, 并引发异常。  Both the and the have affinity to the thread on which the was created, meaning that using them on a different thread is forbidden and throws an exception. 实际上, 此限制也适用于集合。 In effect, this restriction applies to the collection as well.   可能需要在多个线程上使用集合。You may want to use the collection on multiple threads.   例如, 你希望在 "数据收集" 线程上更新集合 (添加或删除项), 同时在 "用户界面" 线程上显示结果, 以便 UI 在数据收集过程中保持响应。   For example, you want to update the collection (add or remove items) on a "data-gathering" thread, while displaying the results on a "user interface" thread, so that the UI remains responsive while data-gathering is happening. 在这种情况下, 您需要负责确保对集合的同步 ("线程安全") 访问。 In such a situation, you are responsible for ensuring synchronized ("thread-safe") access to the collection.   通常使用简单的锁定机制或更精细的同步机制 (如信号量、重置事件等) 来完成此操作。 虽然您必须将应用程序的访问权限同步到集合, 但您还必须确保从 WPF (特别是从) 进行的访问参与相同的同步机制。   This is typically done using either a simple lock mechanism or a more elaborate synchronization mechanism such as semaphores, reset events, etc.   While you must synchronize your application's access to the collection, you must also guarantee that access from WPF (specifically from ) participates in the same synchronization mechanism.  为此，可调用 方法。  You do this by calling the method.   若要在多个线程上使用集合 (其中一个线程是拥有的UI 线程), 应用程序具有以下职责:To use a collection on multiple threads, one of which is the UI thread that owns the , an application has the following responsibilities: 1. 选择同步机制。Choose a synchronization mechanism. 1. 使用该机制将应用程序中的所有访问同步到集合。Synchronize all access from the application to the collection using that mechanism. 1. 调用以告知 WPF 的机制。Call to inform WPF of the mechanism. - 调用必须在 UI 线程上发生。The call must occur on the UI thread. - 在另一线程上使用集合之前, 或在将集合附加到之前, 必须先调用, 以之后的为准。The call must occur before using the collection on a different thread or before attaching the collection to the , whichever is later. - 如果使用简单的锁定机制, 请调用 重载;如果使用更复杂的机制,请调用重载。Call the overload if using a simple lock mechanism; call the overload if using a more elaborate mechanism. 1. 确保对集合所做的更改和该更改的通知 (通过) 具有原子性, 而不能从其他线程访问。Ensure that a change to the collection and the notification of that change (through ) are atomic; no access from other threads can intervene.  (这通常是免费的。  (This is usually free. 例如, 如果所有更改均受同步保护, 则可保证这样。)For instance, guarantees this, provided that all changes are protected by synchronization.) 1. 如果调用 , 则该调用还必须在 UI 线程上发生。If you call , that call must also occur on the UI thread. 1. 如果要在多个 ui 线程上使用同一集合, 则必须在每个 ui 线程上分别调用 (和, 如果需要)。If you want to use the same collection on multiple UI threads, you must call (and , if needed) separately on each UI thread. 1. 避免死锁。Avoid deadlock.  它在选择使用同步时已成为应用程序的责任, 但它还必须考虑 WPF 参与同步的情况, 如下一段所述。  This is already the application's responsibility once it chooses to use synchronization, but it must also take into account WPF's participation in the synchronization, as discussed in the following paragraph. 在返回中, WPF 提供以下行为:In return, WPF provides the following behavior: - 使用给定的同步机制访问集合。The accesses the collection using the given synchronization mechanism. - 维护集合的 "卷影副本", 以供在 UI 线程上使用。The maintains a "shadow copy" of the collection for use on the UI thread. - 事件在到达时 (在任何线程上) 排队。 events are queued up as they arrive (on any thread). - 挂起事件会在 UI 线程上以异步方式应用于该卷影副本。Pending events are applied to the shadow copy asynchronously on the UI thread when it has the opportunity to do so. - 不会直接使用对应用程序可见的任何其他同步机制。The won't directly use any other synchronization mechanism visible to the application. 这是 WPF 有助于避免死锁的方法 (请参阅上一项 7)。This is WPF's way of helping to avoid deadlock (see the previous item 7).   最终效果是, 可以更改任何线程上的集合, 这些更改最终会出现在 UI 线程有时间进行 "更新" 的情况下。The net effect is that you can change the collection on any thread, and those changes eventually appear in the when the UI thread has time to "catch up".  已对实现进行了优化, 以限制更改流向 UI 线程的速率, 以使后台线程保持对 UI 线程的饱和, 并从而使对正常用户输入的响应。  The implementation has been tuned to throttle the rate that changes flow into the UI thread to keep background threads from saturating the UI thread and starving the response to normal user input.

summary.span: 通过使用简单的锁定机制，使 对象能够参与对多个线程上使用的集合的同步访问。

span.span: Enables a object to participate in synchronized access to a collection used on multiple threads by using a simple locking mechanism.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WPF 应用程序可以使用或它的一个子类 (、 、 、 等) 来显示数据的集合。A WPF application can display a collection of data using an or one of its subclasses (, , , , etc.). WPF 通过的子类对集合中的所有访问权限进行通道。 WPF channels all its access to the collection through a subclass of . 和都与在其上创建了的线程关联, 这意味着将禁止在不同的线程上使用它们, 并引发异常。  Both the and the have affinity to the thread on which the was created, meaning that using them on a different thread is forbidden and throws an exception. 实际上, 此限制也适用于集合。 In effect, this restriction applies to the collection as well.   可能需要在多个线程上使用集合。You may want to use the collection on multiple threads.   例如, 你希望在 "数据收集" 线程上更新集合 (添加或删除项), 同时在 "用户界面" 线程上显示结果, 以便 UI 在数据收集过程中保持响应。   For example, you want to update the collection (add or remove items) on a "data-gathering" thread, while displaying the results on a "user interface" thread, so that the UI remains responsive while data-gathering is happening. 在这种情况下, 您负责确保对集合的同步 ("线程安全") 访问, 并确保从 WPF (特别是从) 进行的访问参与相同的同步机制。 In such a situation, you are responsible for ensuring synchronized ("thread-safe") access to the collection and for guaranteeing that access from WPF (specifically from ) participates in the same synchronization mechanism. 通过调用方法, 可以使用简单的锁定机制来实现此目的。 By calling the method, you can do this by using a simple lock mechanism.   若要在多个线程上使用集合, 其中一个线程是拥有的UI 线程, 则必须执行以下操作:To use a collection on multiple threads, one of which is the UI thread that owns the , you must do the following: 1. 在访问集合时实例化要锁定的对象。Instantiate an object to lock when accessing the collection. 1. 通过锁定对象将应用程序中的所有访问同步到集合。Synchronize all access from the application to the collection by locking that object. 1. 调用以告知 WPF 你使用的是简单的锁定机制。Call to inform WPF that you are using a simple lock mechanism. - 调用必须在 UI 线程上发生。The call must occur on the UI thread. - 在另一线程上使用集合之前, 或在将集合附加到之前, 必须先调用, 以之后的为准。The call must occur before using the collection on a different thread or before attaching the collection to the , whichever is later. 1. 确保对集合所做的更改和该更改的通知 (通过) 具有原子性, 而不能从其他线程访问。Ensure that a change to the collection and the notification of that change (through ) are atomic; no access from other threads can intervene.  (这通常是免费的。  (This is usually free. 例如, 如果所有更改均受同步保护, 则可保证这样。)For instance, guarantees this, provided that all changes are protected by synchronization.) 1. 如果调用 , 则该调用还必须在 UI 线程上发生。If you call , that call must also occur on the UI thread. 1. 如果要在多个 ui 线程上使用同一集合, 则必须在每个 ui 线程上分别调用 (和, 如果需要)。If you want to use the same collection on multiple UI threads, you must call (and , if needed) separately on each UI thread. 1. 避免死锁。Avoid deadlock.  它在选择使用同步时已成为应用程序的责任, 但它还必须考虑 WPF 参与同步的情况。  This is already the application's responsibility once it chooses to use synchronization, but it must also take into account WPF's participation in the synchronization. (请参阅下面的详细信息。) (See more, below.) 在返回中, WPF 提供以下行为:In return, WPF provides the following behavior: - 使用锁定机制访问集合。 The accesses the collection using the locking mechanism. - 维护集合的 "卷影副本", 以供在 UI 线程上使用。The maintains a "shadow copy" of the collection for use on the UI thread. - 事件在到达时 (在任何线程上) 排队。 events are queued up as they arrive (on any thread). - 挂起事件会在 UI 线程上以异步方式应用于该卷影副本。Pending events are applied to the shadow copy asynchronously on the UI thread when it has the opportunity to do so. - 不会直接使用对应用程序可见的任何其他同步机制。The will not directly use any other synchronization mechanism visible to the application. 这是 WPF 有助于避免死锁的方法 (请参阅上一项 7)。This is WPF's way of helping to avoid deadlock (see the previous item 7).   最终效果是, 可以更改任何线程上的集合, 这些更改最终会出现在 UI 线程有时间进行 "更新" 的情况下。The net effect is that you can change the collection on any thread, and those changes eventually appear in the when the UI thread has time to "catch up".  已对实现进行了优化, 以限制更改流向 UI 线程的速率, 以使后台线程保持对 UI 线程的饱和, 并从而使对正常用户输入的响应。  The implementation has been tuned to throttle the rate that changes flow into the UI thread to keep background threads from saturating the UI thread and starving the response to normal user input.

span.span: The collection that needs synchronized access.
An object that is passed to the callback.

param.name: synchronizationCallback
param.span: 每当需要访问集合时，就会调用的回调。

param.span: 可用于确保集合一次被一个线程访问。

span.span: You can use it to ensure that the collection is accessed by one thread at a time.

summary.span: 通过使用机制而不是简单的锁定，使 对象能够参与对多个线程上使用的集合的同步访问。

span.span: Enables a object to participate in synchronized access to a collection used on multiple threads by using a mechanism other than a simple lock.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WPF 应用程序可以使用或它的一个子类 (、 、 、 等) 来显示数据的集合。A WPF application can display a collection of data using an or one of its subclasses (, , , , etc.). WPF 通过的子类对集合中的所有访问权限进行通道。 WPF channels all its access to the collection through a subclass of . 和都与在其上创建了的线程关联, 这意味着将禁止在不同的线程上使用它们, 并引发异常。  Both the and the have affinity to the thread on which the was created, meaning that using them on a different thread is forbidden and throws an exception. 实际上, 此限制也适用于集合。 In effect, this restriction applies to the collection as well.   可能需要在多个线程上使用集合。You may want to use the collection on multiple threads.   例如, 你希望在 "数据收集" 线程上更新集合 (添加或删除项), 同时在 "用户界面" 线程上显示结果, 以便 UI 在数据收集过程中保持响应。   For example, you want to update the collection (add or remove items) on a "data-gathering" thread, while displaying the results on a "user interface" thread, so that the UI remains responsive while data-gathering is happening. 在这种情况下, 您负责确保对集合的同步 ("线程安全") 访问, 并确保从 WPF (特别是从) 进行的访问参与相同的同步机制。 In such a situation, you are responsible for ensuring synchronized ("thread-safe") access to the collection and for guaranteeing that access from WPF (specifically from ) participates in the same synchronization mechanism. 通过调用方法, 可以通过使用同步机制 (如信号量、重置事件等) 来执行此操作。 若要在多个线程上使用集合, 其中一个线程是拥有的UI 线程, 则必须执行以下操作:By calling the method, you can do this by using a synchronization mechanism such as a semaphores, a reset event, etc.   To use a collection on multiple threads, one of which is the UI thread that owns the , you must do the following: 1. 选择同步机制。Choose a synchronization mechanism. 1. 使用该机制将应用程序中的所有访问同步到集合。Synchronize all access from the application to the collection using that mechanism. 1. 调用重载, 通知 WPF 你使用的机制不是简单锁定。Call the overload to inform WPF that you are using a mechanism other than simple locking. - 调用必须在 UI 线程上发生。The call must occur on the UI thread. - 在另一线程上使用集合之前, 或在将集合附加到之前, 必须先调用, 以之后的为准。The call must occur before using the collection on a different thread or before attaching the collection to the , whichever is later. 1. 确保对集合所做的更改和该更改的通知 (通过) 具有原子性, 而不能从其他线程访问。Ensure that a change to the collection and the notification of that change (through ) are atomic; no access from other threads can intervene.  (这通常是免费的。  (This is usually free. 例如, 如果所有更改均受同步保护, 则可保证这样。)For instance, guarantees this, provided that all changes are protected by synchronization.) 1. 如果调用 , 则该调用还必须在 UI 线程上发生。If you call , that call must also occur on the UI thread. 1. 如果要在多个 ui 线程上使用同一集合, 则必须在每个 ui 线程上分别调用 (和, 如果需要)。If you want to use the same collection on multiple UI threads, you must call (and , if needed) separately on each UI thread. 1. 避免死锁。Avoid deadlock.  它在选择使用同步时已成为应用程序的责任, 但它还必须考虑 WPF 参与同步的情况。  This is already the application's responsibility once it chooses to use synchronization, but it must also take into account WPF's participation in the synchronization. (请参阅下面的详细信息。) (See more, below.) 在返回中, WPF 提供以下行为:In return, WPF provides the following behavior: - 通过调用使用以下参数注册的来访问集合:The accesses the collection by calling the registered with the following arguments: - `collection`: 感兴趣的集合。`collection`: the collection of interest. - `context`: 已注册的上下文对象。`context`: the registered context object. - `accessMethod`: 执行实际访问的委托。`accessMethod`: a delegate that performs the actual access. - `writeAccess`: `true`如果委托将修改集合, 则为;`false`否则为。`writeAccess`: `true` if the delegate will modify the collection; `false` otherwise. 应在集合上建立同步 (根据需要`context`使用对象和`writeAccess` `accessMethod`值), 调用, 然后释放同步。 Your should establish synchronization on the collection (using the `context` object and the `writeAccess` value, as appropriate), call the `accessMethod`, then release synchronization. - 维护集合的 "卷影副本", 以供在 UI 线程上使用。The maintains a "shadow copy" of the collection for use on the UI thread. - 事件在到达时 (在任何线程上) 排队。 events are queued up as they arrive (on any thread). - 挂起事件会在 UI 线程上以异步方式应用于该卷影副本。Pending events are applied to the shadow copy asynchronously on the UI thread when it has the opportunity to do so. - 不会直接使用对应用程序可见的任何其他同步机制。The will not directly use any other synchronization mechanism visible to the application. 这是 WPF 有助于避免死锁的方法 (请参阅上一项 7)。This is WPF's way of helping to avoid deadlock (see the previous item 7).   最终效果是, 可以更改任何线程上的集合, 这些更改最终会出现在 UI 线程有时间进行 "更新" 的情况下。The net effect is that you can change the collection on any thread, and those changes eventually appear in the when the UI thread has time to "catch up".  已对实现进行了优化, 以限制更改流向 UI 线程的速率, 以使后台线程保持对 UI 线程的饱和, 并从而使对正常用户输入的响应。  The implementation has been tuned to throttle the rate that changes flow into the UI thread to keep background threads from saturating the UI thread and starving the response to normal user input. 参数是传递到的`callback`任意对象。 `context`The `context` parameter is an arbitrary object that is passed to the `callback`. 您可以使用它来确定用于控制对的访问`collection`的同步机制。You can use it to determine the synchronization mechanism used to control access to `collection`. `Context`可以为`null`。`Context` can be `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建的新实例 , 并将该实例与给定对象的给定依赖项属性相关联。This method creates a new instance of a and associates the instance with the given dependency property of the given object. 此方法是将绑定附加到可能不会公开其自己的 SetBinding 方法的任意的方式。This method is the way to attach a binding to an arbitrary that may not expose its own SetBinding method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法设置绑定。The following example shows how to use this method to set a binding. 在此示例中`myNewBindDef` , 是一个描述绑定的对象。In this example, `myNewBindDef` is a object that describes the binding. 绑定目标是`myDateText` 类的实例。The binding target is `myDateText`, an instance of the class.
